name: Multi-tool or Knife
description: A versatile multi-tool or durable knife, essential for various outdoor tasks from cutting rope to opening cans.

name: Camping Stove & Fuel
description: Compact and efficient camping stove with fuel, perfect for cooking hot meals and brewing coffee in the wilderness.

name: Headlamp
description: Powerful and hands-free headlamp with multiple brightness settings, crucial for navigating trails and setting up camp after dark.

name: Air Mattress
description: Comfortable inflatable air mattress for a good night's sleep, providing insulation from the cold ground and enhancing comfort.

name: Sleeping Bag
description: Warm and lightweight sleeping bag, designed for specific temperature ratings to keep you cozy during cold nights outdoors.

name: Aluminum Water Bottle
description: Durable and reusable aluminum water bottle, vital for staying hydrated on your outdoor adventures and treks.

name: First Aid Kit
description: Comprehensive first aid kit with essential supplies for treating minor injuries and emergencies in the backcountry.
image: img/First Aid Kit First Aid Kit.jpg

name: Flashlight
description: Reliable and bright flashlight, providing a focused beam for scouting paths or finding items in the dark.
